definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: perh. excavation, underground chamber;—´[[ח]] abs. Ju Jdg 9:49, cstr. v:Jdg 9:46; pl. [[חְרִחִים]] 1Sa 13:6; —used as hiding-places 1Sa 13:6 (+ [[מְעָרוֹת]], [[חֲוׇחִים]], [[סְלָעִים]], [[בּׂרוֹת]]); as refuge Ju Jdg 9:46 (where connected with shrine), v:Jdg 9:49 (Vrss stronghold; on uncertainty of meaning v. GFM).
